item.title: Azure Flexible Server (MySQL)
item.description: HA is not supported in the Burstable compute tier HA is available for General Purpose and Business Critical tiers HA Options: Zone-redundant HA: Provides redundancy across AZs. Same-zone HA: Provides redundancy within AZ.
